snippet: Punctuating a week of political assaults on Mitt Romney over taxes, President Obama and Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. plan to urge Mr. Romney to follow their example.
abstract: Pres Obama and Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr plan to release their income tax returns, along with a statement calling on Mitt Romney to do the same; move is intended to highlight Romney's exceptional wealth and set the stage for Senate's consideration of the proposed 'Buffett Rule' minimum tax for the wealthiest Americans.

byline.original: By MARK LANDLER and JIM RUTENBERG

lead_paragraph: Punctuating a week of political assaults on Mitt Romney over taxes, President Obama and Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. plan to urge Mr. Romney to follow their example.

headline.main: Obamas and Bidens to Release Tax Returns
headline.print_headline: Obamas and Bidens To Release Tax Returns
